forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 9C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 48F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High near 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with a steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. SSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 12C. ESE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Then remaining mainly cloudy. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 54F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds light and variable.
